name: cagents-marketplace
description: cAgents plugin marketplace - Universal multi-domain agent system

plugins.name: cagents
plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system for Claude Code with 72 specialized agents across software engineering and business operations domains. Features complete workflow orchestration (router, planner, executor, validator, self-correct), Intelligence Layer for proactive issue detection, QA Layer with 9 review agents, Executive Leadership teams (software: CEO/CTO/CFO/COO/VP Engineering, business: CSO), and comprehensive multi-domain architecture. Software domain (46 agents) handles code development, testing, architecture. Business domain (23 agents) handles strategic planning, forecasting, market analysis, operations management. Universal /designer and /reviewer commands work across all domains.
